alert.note: Alert for Dorchester; Somerset; Wicomico (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 4:12PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Somerset, Wicomico and central Dorchester Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 411 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking scattered strong thunderstorms 10 miles east of Saint Inigoes Creek, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Deal Island around 440 PM EDT. Salisbury, Fruitland, Salisbury University and Hebron around 530 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Wetipquin, Brookview, Eldorado, Trinity, Cokesbury, Hoopersville, Eden, Kingston, Mount Vernon and Chesapeake Heights. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
